description: Try our easy to follow Choc Chip Cookie Brownies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Chip Cookie Brownies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Green’s 40% Less Sugar Chocolate Brownie
1 pkt Green’s 40% Less Sugar Choc Chip Cookies

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C (160°C fan forced). Grease and line base and sides of slice pan with baking paper.
Place brownie mix into a mixing bowl, add eggs and melted butter. Mix with a wooden spoon until combined.
Transfer mixture into prepared slice pan, spreading mixture evenly to the edges of the pan. Set aside while you make the cookie dough.
Place cookie mix into a bowl with egg and melted butter. Mix with a wooden spoon until just combined, then knead gently with hands to form a smooth dough.
Scatter spoonfuls of dough onto top of brownie batter and press down to partially submerge the dough into the brownie mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes. Cover with foil and bake for a further 10 minutes. Take off foil and bake for a further 10 minutes, or until tops of cookies are golden brown.
